bibl.title: Christian Use of Pharaonic Sacred Space in Western Thebes: The Case of TT 85 and 87.
bibl.note: Introduction. - TT 85 and TT 87 - Archaeological and textual finds. - The inhabitants of TT 85 and 87 - Apa Ananias and friends?: Ostracon TT 85/117; - Ostracon TT 85/92; - Ostracon EA 14223. - Apa Ananias = Ananias the bishop? - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Sacred Space and Sacred Function in Ancient Thebes

bibl.seg: Heike Behlmer, Christian Use of Pharaonic Sacred Space in Western Thebes: The Case of TT 85 and 87.
Peter F. Dorman & Betsy M. Bryan (edd.), Sacred Space and Sacred Function in Ancient Thebes = SAOC. 61 (Chicago, 2007) pp. 163-175, 6 figg.

Introduction. - TT 85 and TT 87 - Archaeological and textual finds. - The inhabitants of TT 85 and 87 - Apa Ananias and friends?: Ostracon TT 85/117; - Ostracon TT 85/92; - Ostracon EA 14223. - Apa Ananias = Ananias the bishop? - Conclusion.
